div.p:

die mensis nouembris anno Domini et cetera lxvjto

in vendicione ferri soluet viij s'

dicione bituminis et salis soluet viij s'

salis soluet viij s'

ven
dicione bituminis ferri soluet viij s'
conuictus

Eodem die alexander meignes et thomas de camera duo balliuorum huius
burgi precipiebat Dauid blabir nomine parte domini nostri Regis pro primo Inueni
ret securos plegios ad intrandum coram supprimo domino nostro Rege pro sua inobediencia
Andree scherar' vnius eciam balliuorum dicti burgi eo quod nolebat dare plegium legalem
pro se et parte sua quod thomas broysur' et sibi adherentes erunt indempnes de se et sibi
adherentes aliter quam et per viam Juris Secundo quod non reced pretorio nomine quo supra q
Inueniret plegium legalem quod dictus thomas broysur' erit indempnus de se et parte sua
tota aliter quam et per viam Juris

Eodem die dictus Dauid blabir' conuictus fuit per assisam iurectam pro inobediencia
Andree scherar' ut premittitur per causas prenotatas et extraxit per manum suam
terras suas vniuersas in plegiagium predictis balliuis ad comparendum coram domino nostro
Rege et eius consilio pro predicta inobediencia responsurus ad mandatum dictorum domi
norum super premunicione octo dierum

+ Willelmus adamson' conuictus fuit per confessionem propriam pro fractione communis statuti
in vendicione ferri soluet ad mandatum consilij

supra

mo conuictus fuit per assisam pro fractione communis statuti
soluet viij s'

conuictus fuit per assisam simili modo pro vendicione

vnam missam sancti sanguinis

Alexander de haya conuictus per assisam pro communi foristallacione
et transiundi extra montes cum lana ad vendendum et
de manibus vicinorum suorum xl s'

Morisius thomson' apud ecclesiam de Rothymay finiuit cum preposito
pro quinque solidis et obligatur per Juramentum corporale quod de cetero portabit omnia bona
et mercandisas quas emet in patria ad burgum nostrum

Curia gilde tenta per prepositum decimo die mensis aprilis anno Domini et cetera
lxvijo

Quo die alexander de haya accusatus per prepositum de inobediencia
posuit se in voluntate prepositi de stando correctione ipsius et communis
consilij de eadem actione

Item Robertus de buchane conuictus fuit per assisam de communi foristallacione
lane et pellium extra burgum et pro fractione precij eorundem et finiuit
cum preposito pro dicto forisfacto xl s'

Vicesimo die mensis Augusti anno Domini iijo gilbertus moryson' adiudicatur
in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
talyour' et emendabit eidem prout
Jura volunt

Eodem die dictus morisius tailyour' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta pertur
bacione dicti gilberti et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

head.foreign: testibus productis per Johannem de Kintor in causa mota inter ipsum et henricum hertwitson'

div.p:
vokat maystir Willam vocat the fyrst witnes sworne and examnyt deponys and sayis that
he was by herde and saw and for witnes was tane quhar' Johne' of Kintor askyt at Robert
boyde in his seke bede lyande gif he hade payit the twa hamburgh barellis of salmunde to hen
ry hertwitson' the quhilkis he promittyt to pay til him on his behalfe and that herde the said
Robert say that he hade payit the twa hamburgh barellis of salmunde on Johne' of Kintoris behalf
to the saide henry and that he tuk apon' his sawle bot he saide he was awande twa barellis
of salmunde to the saide henry for his awne propir' det and nocht for Johne' of Kintoris det
and that his obligacione was frede

Waus Johne' the Waus seriande the secunde witnes sworne' and examnyt concordis in all thingis
with' the fyrst witnes

andirson' Alexander andirson' the thride witnes sworne' and examnyt concordis in al thingis with'
the twa witnes gangande befor'

tailyur' Duncane tailyour' the ferde witnes sworne' and examnyt concordis with' the thre witnes
gangande befor'

moyses Johne' moyses the fyft witnes sworne' and examnyt deponys be his athe that he cumande fra
the key met with Johne' of Kintor and henry hertwitson' and herde the saide henry aske
at the saide Johne' of Kyntor quhy walde he nocht pay him the twa barellis of salmunde
that he acht him and he saide that he trowit that he was payit be Robert boyde and henry saide
to Johne' of Kintor that it was in his defalt that he was nocht payit be cause he walde
nocht gif Robert boyde the querde of salmunde that he promittyt to gif him and that he
herde the saide Johne' of Kintor say than that furth' with' in continent he sulde sende that
querde of salmunde to Robert boyde et vltra nescit //

Isabell the spous' of Robert boyde the sext witnes sworne' and examnyt deponis and sayis
be hir' athe that scho herde hir' husbande say that he hade payit henry hertwitson'
twa hamburgh barellis of salmunde on Johne' of Kintoris behalf and that his obligacione
was fullely payit at the ressauyng of the last barell' of salmunde ressauyt be henry
hertwitson' fra him and that scho saw the saide henry bring hir' husbandis obliga
cione til him and grauntyt him fullely payit and than hir' husbande askit at hen
ry Johne' of Kintoris obligacione to be deliueryt til him and that henry denyit to
gif him sayande he was nocht payit of the twa barellis of salmunde contenit in it and
quhen hir' husbande herde him say swa he opinly declarit that he hade payit hym
that twa barellis of salmunde of the fyrst salmunde that he deliueryt til hym and for'
that caus' hir' husbande reffoysit to tak his awin obligacione fra him and than henry kest
the obligacione til hir' and hir' husbande forbade hir' to tak it and than the saide henry rafe
hir' husbandis obligacione and kest it in the fyr' and that hir' saide husbande tuk on his'
saule that henry was payit of Johne' of Kyntoris twa barellis of salmunde and his obliga
cione was fred'

ruthirfurd' Dominus Dauid ruthirfurd capellanus the sewint witnes sworne' and examnyt concordis in al thingis
with maystir Williame vokate alexander andirson' Johne' the Waus' and Duncane tailyour' and atoure he
depoynys that he wist wele that Johne' of Kintor sende to Robert boyde a querde of salmunde

Hill Dauid of hill the achtande witnes sworne' and examnyt concordis with maystir Willam vokat
alexander andirson Johne' the waus Duncane tailyour' and ser Dauid Ruthirfurde and atour'
he deponys that he herde Robert boyde say to Johne' of Kyntor that henry hertwitson' had'
dischargit him of the twa barellis of salmunde that he acht him and tane til him of the pay
ment of thaim and dischargit him

henry Henry Johne' of Kintoris seruande the nynt witnes sworne and examnyt deponys
that he hade to Robert boyde ix salmunde saltyt to fulfill the twa barellis of sal
munde that he acht til henry hertwitson' and na mar' wate he

div.head: nomina assise
div.p:
Dauid colyson' patricius badenach' Johannes mathouson' gilbertus de camera henricus
de ruthirfurde Robertus Wormot Johannes stewart Johannes glenmalyne Walterus de
hay morison' Willelmus malysson' Alexander de hay alexander howyson' et Robertus pratt

nar Alexandrum de camera
et Johannem de marr' deputatos camerarij
Johannes de catnes in amerciamento pro communi foristallacione huius burgi
Willelmus Duncanson' conuictus pro foristallacione

thomas maliceson' conuictus pro foristallacione

Willelmus stewinson' conuictus pro foristallacione

Willelmus de carnyquhing conuictus pro foristallacione
Robertus de buchan conuictus pro foristallacione
Walterus pyot conuictus pro foristallacione
Wmfridus andirson' conuictus pro foristallacione
Dauid galichtly conuictus per confessionem propriam
Donaldus de tulche conuictus per propriam confessionem
Willelmus gray conuictus pro foristallacione
Ranaldus tailyour' conuictus pro foristallacione
Patricius sticlaw conuictus pro foristallacione
Johannes tailyour' conuictus pro foristallacione
Johannes blabir' conuictus pro foristallacione pellium
Willelmus mor' conuictus per confessionem propriam
Willelmus suete conuictus pro communi foristallacione
Andreas atkin conuictus pro foristallacione
Robertus club conuictus pro foristallacione pellium
thomas Jamyson' de strabolgy conuictus pro foristallacione

div.head: absentes
div.p:
Jacobus andirson' in amerciamento quia non comparuit ad sectam curie camerarij
Robertus part eciam non comparuit
thomas curthow non comparuit
Johannes Watson' de gowill' non comparuit
thomas Jamyson' prat non comparuit
quilibet eorum adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie camerarie quia non comparuerunt
ad sectam curie sue /

mathouson' Dauy mathouson' Alexander
thomas prat

Quarto die mensis Januarij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo Robertus blindsele pater comparens
coram preposito et balliuis huius burgi pro tribunali sedentibus in pretorio eiusdem et ibidem
per fustem et baculum assignauit aquam suam de le raike Elisabet de ruthirfurde
sponse et Roberto blindsele filio suo pro terminis suis quos habet de preposito et balliuis
in assedacione et quod dicti elisabet et robertus filius coniunctim et diuisim gaudebunt
dictam aquam pro terminis suis

Matheus de culan assignauit aquam suam de le pot quam habet in assedacione de communitate
huius burgi Dauid colyson' pro omnibus terminis suos sue assedacionis coram andrea alanson' preposito
Johanne de marr' Johanne de scrogis alexandro blindsele Johanne Waus duobus balliuorum Roberto gillespy
scriba curie dicti burgi Dauid simson' Johanne Wormot et gilberto de camera cum alijs diuersis

Robertus blindsele assignauit aquam dimidij Rethis de le Raike que thome
de camera pro terminis assedacionis factis patri suo quam aquam Robertus blindsele pater assig
nauit sibi et matri sue pro terminis antedictis et prefatus thomas promisit dicto Roberto in
assedacionem dicte aque in vltimo anno pro competente precio et dictus thomas soluet
annuatim firmam dicte aque pro terminis suis balliuis huius burgi qui pro tempore fuer

Joneta vokat sponsa Johannis pantone' de petmedan assignauit aquam de
crois et de villam eiusdem pro terminis assedacionis sue prefato Johanni in marito suo
coram Ricardo de Kintor preposito Johanne Knollis Dauid simson' alexandro howyson'
et alijs diuersis de communi consilio /

clayis stanskyn de strailesoun magister sub deo nauis vocati mary Knicht Intrauit ad
xvij last of beir'
Item a last of terr'
Item jC estlande burdis
Item j last of mele
Matheus

jC of xxiiij xxiij and xxij fute lang
Item and al that is within xx xvj fute ij for ane
and all that is vndir viij fute iij for ane /

Adriane has entiryt vthir half last of hamburghs of beir'
Item vj barellis of terr'

a brissin pot tane be sere John of chawmer chaplayn of saynt Jamys altar' o'o' overwrites '&'.f John Kimdyis
lande for his annuale acht to the saide altar' yerly and present to Johne' of tulydef seriande
in the tym to demayn as law will at the merkat cors' the fyrst day prisit to xviij s'
Item vthir tua pottis prisit on the samyn wis' to ix s' be saide seriande
Item a hingande lawar' prisit to ij s' ij d' and al thar pundis prisit on the samyn wys' the
four' merkat dayis witnes John caskyn John litstar' John of tulydef and philp of Drum
brek seriande the some' xxix s' vj d'
Item ij aulde schetis in alde bassingis a myrrour' aulde coueryng ij alde codis and
ij aulde hanys prisit to vj s' be philp of Drumbrek befor' thir' witnes William
clerk baxtar and Duncane of lammynton and robert alexanderson'

Johne' the Waus
Johne' Wormot
Dauy meignes
William of cadyow
Dauy howe
Johne of marr'
Johne' nory
